name: D-Hero
author: genesis206
notes:
Finally hit KoG after trying all kinds of different decks. The Cyclones were everything, and not even just against SSA Water. Extra deck was 2 Dangerous, 2 Slash Dragons and 1 Ojama Knight for those Chazz Overflow decks. 

Ran out of D-Heroes from time to time in longer games, but the consistency was clean and Restart saved my "triple poly, 1 cyclone" opening hands that happened way too often.
